channel.description: Love to get outdoors and discover nature's treasures? Hiking Treks is the show for you. We review hikes and excursions, review outdoor gear and interview a variety of naturalists and adventurers. Look for new episodes each week.

item.description: Tips for trekking around the tallest mountain in Oregon
item.title: S02 EP04 Mt. Hood, Oregon

item.description: We explore fun walks to climbing areas about the beautiful Colorado city of Boulder.
item.title: S02 EP03 Bouldering Around Boulder

item.description: Put your fitness to the test with this invigorating hill climb.
item.title: S02 EP02 Caribou Mountain, Maine

item.description: We tackle Stawamus Chief outside of Vancouver, BC and you should too!
item.title: S02 EP01 Stawamus Chief

item.description: Oahu, Hawaii, has some picturesque hikes and this is one of the best!
item.title: S01 EP04 Kuliouou Ridge Trail

item.description: Hiking the Appalachian Trail and Freeman Trail in Georgia
item.title: S01 EP03 Blood Mountain Loop

item.description: Wilderness Area Garden of the Gods in Illinois is a delightful spot for an extended hike.
item.title: S01 EP02 Garden of the Gods Wilderness

item.description: We check out this powerfully scenic hike following the river in the Idaho Panhandle National Forests.
item.title: S01 EP01 Upper Priest Lake Trail to Continental Creek Trail

channel.title: Hiking Treks
